author: mstamenk
body:
#### PR description:
This PR adds additional filter bits to the trigger objects such that analysers can perform trigger matching on Jet, FatJet, HT, BoostedTau using the latest development in PNet and AK8.

title: [WIP] Updating trigger bits for Jet, HT, FatJet, BoostedTaus trigger objects to account for updated PNet and AK8 HLT path
